entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
